# Dependencies
node_modules/
vendor/

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# IDE and editors
.idea/
.vscode/
*.swp
*.swo
*~
.project
.classpath
.settings/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Logs
logs/
*.log
npm-debug.log*

# Build outputs
dist/
build/
*.min.js
*.min.css

# Temporary files
tmp/
temp/
*.tmp
*.temp

# Cache
.cache/
.parcel-cache/

# Coverage
coverage/

# Backup files
*.bak
*.backup

# Package lock files (optional - uncomment if desired)
# package-lock.json
# yarn.lock

# EmailJS credentials (if stored in separate file)
emailjs-config.js
credentials.js
